original_title: Zig: You Were Born to Win
overview: An inspirational dive into the remarkable life of Zig Ziglar. His success and a transformational journey are brought to life through the testimonials of several self-made millionaires who followed Zigâ€™s philosophy. Dave Ramsey, Pastor Jack Graham, Coach Lou Holtz and many more explain how the six steps Mr. Ziglar identified as the foundation for success transformed their lives and countless other lives of those who have lived by them.
title: Zig: You Were Born to Win
